mapper.select: SELECT a.id as id, a.tradingday as tradingday,a.instrumentid as instrumentid,a.lastprice as lastprice,a.highestprice as highestprice, a.lowestprice as lowestprice,a.presettlementprice as presettlementprice,a.precloseprice as precloseprice,a.preopeninterest as preopeninterest, a.openprice as openprice,a.volume as volume,a.turnover as turnover,a.openinterest as openinterest,a.updatetime as updatetime,a.updateminute as updateminute, a.upratio as upratio,a.interestminus as interestminus,a.interestratio as interestratio,a.oneminopenprice as oneminopenprice,a.averprice as averprice, a.oneminupratio as oneminupratio,a.oneminupprice as oneminupprice,a.onetimestamp as onetimestamp FROM QUANT_FUTURE_MD_ONEMIN a WHERE a.instrumentid=#{InstrumentID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.tradingday=#{TradingDay} and id>5261 and id< 5280 ORDER BY a.id

SELECT a.id as id, a.tradingday as tradingday,a.instrumentid as instrumentid,a.lastprice as lastprice,a.highestprice as highestprice, a.lowestprice as lowestprice,a.presettlementprice as presettlementprice,a.precloseprice as precloseprice,a.preopeninterest as preopeninterest, a.openprice as openprice,a.volume as volume,a.turnover as turnover,a.openinterest as openinterest,a.updatetime as updatetime,a.updateminute as updateminute, a.upratio as upratio,a.interestminus as interestminus,a.interestratio as interestratio,a.oneminopenprice as oneminopenprice,a.averprice as averprice, a.oneminupratio as oneminupratio,a.oneminupprice as oneminupprice,a.onetimestamp as onetimestamp FROM QUANT_FUTURE_MD_ONEMIN a WHERE a.instrumentid=#{InstrumentID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.tradingday=#{TradingDay} and a.updateminute=#{UpdateMin} ORDER BY a.id
